name: WebGL2RenderingContext.texStorage3D
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.texStorage3D() method of the WebGL API specifies all levels of a three-dimensional texture or two-dimensional array texture.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'texStorage3D' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
